Project : QuitÂ¶

Exit CcpNmr Analysis and close the current CCPN project

This option will exit from the CcpNmr Analysis program entirely, but where appropriate propt the user about whether to save any current CCPN project.

When selecting this option the user is asked to confirm the operation. If confirmed the user will then be asked whether to save any currently active CCPN project, if it has been modified.
